items.title: Period.
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Period.

Adding any other marginalized identity to Blackness is another layer of oppression to fight. Black queer people living their truths is a beautiful resistance.

bostonglobe.com

Black queer lives are Black lives that matter, too - The Boston Globe

items.title: Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The seventh...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Good morning and happy Kwanzaa, beautiful people! The seventh and final principle of Kwanzaa is IMANI, which means FAITH. How do you show your community, your teachers, your family, and YOURSELF that you have faith in them?

items.title: ‚Äú2020 highlighted the power of community. People provided...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚Äú2020 highlighted the power of community. People provided mutual aid to those in need during the COVID-19 crisis when the local and federal governments failed to do so. The protests and demonstrations for racial justice led to substantial changes (e.g., SB-217, renaming Stapleton and Columbus Park, eliminating school resources officers from DPS, etc.) that myself, friends and comrades, and elders had been pushing for decades. Black women and femmes, many who are grassroots organizers, were instrumental in mitigating voter suppression and advocating for policy changes.

‚ÄúIn sum, this was a year where, in a time of distress, grief, and tragedy, we saw the power of collective action to create the changes we want to see in our community and re-imagine new or better systems.‚Äù

‚Äî Dr. Apryl Alexander

Bye.

denverite.com

What a turbulent 2020 has taught some of Denver's leaders, influencers and inspirers

Bye.Bye.

items.title: ‚ÄúThis new civil rights movement ‚Äì these kids are bold, and I...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúThis new civil rights movement ‚Äì these kids are bold, and I have to be just as bold," Rigmaiden said. "You know, I‚Äôm 71 now and I‚Äôm going to fight to keep that little sign in my window.‚Äù

Helen Rigmaiden, you are our family forever. No amount of time or space could ever keep us from riding for you. ‚úäüèΩ

The Black Lives Matter sign she hung in her window two years ago is getting more attention than ever before. It's not the kind of attention she wanted.

items.title: ‚ÄúThis is not a new conversation we‚Äôre having. It‚Äôs one...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúThis is not a new conversation we‚Äôre having. It‚Äôs one that keeps coming up,‚Äù said Ari Lipscomb, an organizer with BLM Denver. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve consistently asked for accountability. We‚Äôve consistently asked for transparency. We‚Äôve consistently asked for shared power and for the actions of BLMGN to reflect the work that we do.‚Äù

The Black Lives Matter movement, founded in 2013, has changed the way the nation talks about race. But the organization itself may be disconnected from local chapters.

items.title: #CALLTOACTION We are infuriated. In the midst of an uprising of global proportions fueled by the worldwide demanding of...
items.content_html:
#CALLTOACTION We are infuriated. In the midst of an uprising of global proportions fueled by the worldwide demanding of #justiceforBlacklives, the justice system is still being weaponized against us in real time. With the entire world hyper-focused on racial injustice white supremacists have doubled down in full confidence that they will be protected by the justice department above all else. Boulder DA's Office, 20th Judicial District - DA Michael Dougherty is functioning as a vehicle of white supremacy in his refusal to drop these trumped up charges against this sister after years of enduring vile behaviors like the use of racial slurs against her children. We are in fierce support of Mrs. Jeweldine Kastman and her family, and we demand a full dismissal of all charges against them. Call Da Dougherty’s office and demand he dismiss this case today and everyday until it is done! (720) 470-7871
Boulder County case number 19CR1876
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #AbolishthePolice #AbolitionNOW #BlackLivesMatter #BLM5280 #solidarity
Boulder DA's Office, 20th Judicial District - DA Michael Dougherty

[Image Description: BLM5280 letterhead featuring the BLM5280 skyline logo on a white background with a deep grey border reading the following:
November 11 2020
We, the members of Black Lives Matter 5280, after careful consideration of Mrs. Jeweldine Kastman’s case, believe she has been the victim of prejudice in the criminal justice system. Our core values demand we take personal responsibility for denouncing the kind of discrimination, harassment, and racism Mrs. Kastman has experienced in Boulder County. Further, we believe the District Attorney has a responsibility to the public to reexamine her case through an unbiased lens. We believe that acknowledgment and reconsideration of the implicit biases in this case should lead to the conclusion that the interests of justice require that Mrs. Kastman's case be dismissed.
Mrs. Kastman moved to Colorado just a couple of years ago having never experienced the kind of blatant racism she would encounter from her neighbors here. cont. in comments]

items.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
items.content_html:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
